PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08842022-07-14,  PS,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 244, Nova Scotia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 244 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of federal concern; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the wind and rainstorm that occurred November 22, 2021 to November 24, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
